title: Here’s the REAL Parler Story (Ep 1450)
description:
In this episode, I set the record straight about what happened with Parler. I also address how Saul Alinsky’s rules are coming back to haunt liberals. 

News Picks:


Here’s the real story behind the firing of the Parler CEO. Pay special attention to my comments.


AOC doesn’t like getting fact-checked. 


Hypocrite John Kerry took a private jet to Iceland to get a “climate award.”

There’s a new documentary out about the great Thomas Sowell.


The side effects of the second coronavirus vaccinations can be worse than the first, according to this media report.
